summary.span: 沿著一組 繪製 屬性的值。

span.span: Animates the value of a property along a set of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要畫面格動畫的目標值由定義其屬性，其中包含的集合物件。A key frame animation's target values are defined by its property, which contains a collection of objects. 每個定義一段的動畫，與它自己的目標和。Each defines a segment of the animation with its own target and . 當動畫執行時，它從進展一個索引鍵值在指定的下一個索引鍵時間。When the animation runs, it progresses from one key value to the next at the specified key times. 有三種類別，針對每個支援的插補方法的其中一個： ， ，和。There are three types of classes, one for each supported interpolation method: , , and . 不同於、可以有多個有兩個目標值。Unlike a , a can have more than two of target values. 您也可以控制個別的插補方法區段。You can also control the interpolation method of individual segments.

span.span: KeyFrame Animation Sample

remarks.format: ## Remarks A不接受文字做為子系，所以此方法會擲回除非在衍生的類別已覆寫此行為可加入文字。A does not accept text as a child, so this method will throw an unless a derived class has overridden this behavior which allows text to be added.

exception.span: 衍生類別 (Derived Class) 尚未覆寫預設行為，不允許加入文字。

span.span: A derived class has not overridden the default behavior, which does not allow text to be added.

summary.span: 計算值，代表正在顯示動畫之屬性的目前值，由這個 執行個體所決定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by this instance of .

returns.span: 屬性的計算值，由目前的執行個體所決定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`defaultOriginValue`是第一個組合鏈結中，在這個值會是快照集 （如果有的話） 或基底屬性的值; 否則這個值會與鏈結中的上一個動畫所傳回的值這不是 。If the `defaultOriginValue` is the first in the composition chain, this value will be the snapshot value (if one is available) or the base property value; otherwise this value will be the value returned by the previous animation in the chain with an that is not . `defaultDestinationValue`是基底值，如果動畫是位在第一個動畫撰寫層的屬性; 否則值會是輸出值，從上一個動畫撰寫層的屬性。The `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value if the animation is in the first composition layer of animations on a property; otherwise the value is the output value from the previous composition layer of animations for the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值會指定是否在動畫重複時累加動畫值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the animation's value accumulates when it repeats.

value.span: 如果動畫會在其 屬性造成動畫重複其簡單的持續期間時往上累加動畫值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the animation accumulates its values when its property causes it to repeat its simple duration; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為`true`，動畫的輸出值只會累積當動畫的屬性造成動畫重複其簡單持續時間。When this property is set to `true`, the animation's output values only accumulate when the animation's property causes it to repeat its simple duration. 它不會累積其值，因為其父代重複重新啟動時，或其時鐘已重新啟動從呼叫。It does not accumulate its values when it restarts because its parent repeated or because its clock was restarted from a call.
